description: This file defines the DockerNetwork class, a subclass of DockerResource, which manages Docker network resources including creation, reading, and deletion operations. It interacts with Docker API clients and models to perform network management tasks.

classes.name: DockerNetwork
classes.description: Represents a Docker network resource, providing methods to create, read, and delete Docker networks, with configurable properties such as driver, options, scope, and IPv6 support.

methods.name: _create
methods.description: Creates a Docker network using the provided DockerApiClient, validates creation, and sets the active resource.

methods.name: _read
methods.description: Reads and returns the active Docker network resource matching the name, if it exists.

methods.name: _delete
methods.description: Deletes the Docker network resource if it exists, handling exceptions and validation.
